name: PCBrawlers
description:
(Downloadable Link Below)

So get this: we take the Polcompballs right? And we turn it into a fighting game

At the moment I have only been able to implement 2 characters: Apolitical and Ancom, but I plan to round out the rest of the spectrum too (sorry for the clickbait) along with some other neat references and features

Looking forward to hearing your feedback and ideas in the comments below, thanks for playing!

Features: 

- Controller support (Xbox 360/One, Dualshock 4 and Switch Pro Controller) 

- Maximum 2 Player PVP and Computer Player battles (Click on the Player 1 / Player 2 card to turn the fighter into a CPU)

- Platform Fighter-styled movesets and mechanics

(Features are in their early stages so expect some bugs)

Credits: 

- Inspired by the r/Polcompball Community and Centricide Webseries (Jreg)

- Sound effects sampled from Jreg, Nintendo, Riot Games and various Stock Audio channels

- Commentator voice sampled from fakeyou.com - League of Legends Announcer

Music: 

Trainwreck Of Electro Swing - A Hat in Time Remix 

Jreg x Grandbeats - Agree with Me (instrumental)

Special thanks to friends and family for playtesting and support
